summary: This is an email chain from February 2020 regarding the fulfillment of a grand jury subpoena for American Airlines travel records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and another individual. An American Airlines analyst provides the requested passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and usage information.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her American Airlines travel records are being provided in response to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued for Travel Records
events.description: A grand jury subpoena is issued, requesting American Airlines travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell and another individual.

events.title: American Airlines Provides Subpoenaed Records
events.description: An American Airlines analyst sends the requested passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information for Ghislaine Maxwell and another individual in response to the grand jury subpoena.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued for American Airlines travel records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and at least one other individual.
American Airlines Corporate Security provided passenger reservation records, ticket copies, and ticket usage information in response to the subpoena.
The document is an email chain from February 2020, showing active investigation into Maxwell's travel at that time.
The correspondence involves an American Airlines Analyst in Revenue Fraud Corporate Security.
The email chain includes discussion about handling a password-protected document related to the subpoena.
